name: Istio Ingress Monitoring
description: A dashboard for monitoring key Istio Ingress metrics like request rate, total requests, errors, and latency.

pages.name: Overview
pages.description: General overview of Istio Ingress performance.

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT rate(count(*), 1 minute) FROM istio_requests_total WHERE source_app = 'istio-ingressgateway' SINCE 1 hour ago TIMESERIES
SELECT rate(count(*), 1 minute) FROM istio_requests_total WHERE source_app = 'istio-ingressgateway' AND response_code LIKE '5%' SINCE 1 hour ago TIMESERIES
SELECT percentile(istio_request_duration_seconds, 95) FROM istio_requests_total WHERE source_app = 'istio-ingressgateway' SINCE 1 hour ago TIMESERIES
SELECT count(*) FROM istio_requests_total WHERE source_app = 'istio-ingressgateway' FACET destination_service SINCE 1 hour ago

widgets.title: Total Connection Bytes by Cluster and Namespace

nrqlQueries.query: FROM Metric SELECT average(envoy_cluster_upstream_cx_rx_bytes_total) WHERE source_app='istio-ingressgateway' FACET clusterName, namespaceName TIMESERIES AUTO
FROM Metric SELECT histogram(istio_request_duration_milliseconds_bucket, 1000) WHERE reporter = 'destination' FACET source_canonical_service
FROM Metric SELECT (filter(rate(sum(istio_requests_total), 1 minute), WHERE response_code LIKE '5%')) AS 'Errors' WHERE reporter = 'destination' FACET source_workload TIMESERIES
FROM Metric SELECT rate(sum(istio_requests_total), 1 SECOND) AS 'Req/Sec' where reporter = 'source' FACET destination_canonical_service, response_code TIMESERIES
FROM Metric SELECT histogram(istio_request_duration_milliseconds_bucket, 1000) AS 'Requests' WHERE reporter = 'source'
